DOC.brief_summary: Peptide YY ( PYY ) gastrointestinal hormone release enteroendocrine cell upon food intake . The N-terminal truncated form , PYY3-36 , exert anorexic effect . In study want investigate kinetics PYY1-36 PYY3-36 examine whether C-terminally degrade metabolite , PYY3-34 , form infusion PYY .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Normal BMI ( 18.525kg/m2 ) Diabetes Mellitus Gastric bypass Noncaucasian Height change > 3 kg within last two month Hemoglobin < 7.6 mmol/l Chronic disease Smoking Regularly use medicine Drug abuse
